captions.text:
Everybody plays "Improbable Scenes",
here's how it works:

You wrote scene suggestions,
put them in this box,

our staff took out the ones we
already did, I'll pick up and read them,

they'll step ahead and do the
first thing that comes to their heads.

I'll start with:
'What not to do in a jail visitation?'

Folks, I brought my sister
for this visitation...

How are you, folks?
I came to visit you as usual...

- Do you want me to show you
one by one or all at once? - All at once.

Mr. Wally, your mother is waiting
for you in the club entrance!

So you'll see the plastic bag.
Where the fuck is Wally, man?

And that's the reason
dinosaurs are extinct!

- Are you following me on Twitter?
- Yeah!

No, I don't want you to clean it...
No...

Stop it,
I don't want you to clean...

Dinosaurs!
Let's give them some cigarettes!
